column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=You see that in all the old Rust Belt cities .
#Text=Reading , Pennsylvania was one of the most dangerous cities I ’ve ever walked around in , and I thought , “ This is what 1982 New York must have felt like . ”
#Text=Yeah , I moved down to New York in 1980 — that was pretty rough ! [ Laughs ]
#Text=A friend of mine once said if you took someone from 1982 New York and you transplanted them into 2007 New York , the first thing they would say is , “ Where did all these people come from ? ! ”
#Text=That the streets just used to be barren back then .
#Text=I 'm like that too .
#Text=Where I live my view of the sunset is gone because two new luxury towers have gone up .
#Text=They ’re building two additional ones .

#Text=I do n't know who these people are or where they get all their money because they are charging $ 6,000 a month for these apartments , and I ’m thinking who is spending all this money and wandering around the city like it ’s a pedestrian mall that could be in any kind of suburbia .
#Text=Marilyn Manson
#Text=Marilyn Manson is a member ?
#Text=Yes , he 's a member who has been given an honorary priesthood .
#Text=When asked about what Satanism is he can be very articulate in explaining it .
#Text=But his own music is his own art .
#Text=His stage shows are his own , and they do n't really exemplify Satanism in particular .
#Text=It ’s more of a character .
#Text=Yeah , he ’s created a character .
#Text=We say people forget about past orthodoxies , something that was culturally popular or permeating at one point or another , people forget about that .
#Text=What Brian Warner did was he looked at David Bowie and Alice Cooper and re-created and repackaged them , and made a fortune .
#Text=Is he an active member ?
#Text=He ’s an honorary priest , but he does his own thing .
#Text=If asked about our philosophies he can explain it .
#Text=The interesting thing is when his first album came out the two of us met on a panel that we were doing about racism in music that was being sponsored by Seconds Magazine .
#Text=Nobody knew who Brian Warner was at that point , and he came up to me and gave me a CD and he was all in costume .
#Text=But he said " I heard about you and I wanted to meet you , " so we moved aside and talked for a little while and I learned he really did understand Satanism .
#Text=I told Anton LaVey that this guy was pretty smart and this gimmick is going to do well ; it ’s clever .
#Text=He ’s using this serial killer and Hollywood star combination , and he ’s a smart guy and creating his own persona that is probably going to be successful .
#Text=It took off immediately , and when Marilyn Manson was out on tour in California he asked if he could meet Anton LaVey and he was impressed .
#Text=He is a really sweet and sincere guy , which has nothing to do with what all of the world sees in just his act and his art .
